description: Landau's approximation to population of x^2 + y^2.
references: D. Shanks, The second-order term in the asymptotic expansion of B(x), Math. Comp., 18 (1964), 75-86.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Sean A. Irvine, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..999
Index entries for sequences related to populations of quadratic forms
formula: a(n) = round(b*2^n/sqrt(log(2^n))) where b=0.764223654... is the Landau-Ramanujan constant (A064533).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: More terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 23 2011
